thread.title: Teara Leaupepe Timoteo
thread.title_full: CarFinance2U reviewed by Teara Leaupepe Timoteo

author: Teara Leaupepe Timoteo
title: Teara Leaupepe Timoteo
text:
I can't thank Laura enough for her guidance and patience throughout the process of buying my first ever car. Not only did she keep in constant contact with me with updates, she answered every single random question i had and never made me feel stupid for asking in the first place :)
I always imagined the whole process to be quite daunting but i couldn't have experienced a better journey in what feels like a huge milestone!
CarFinance2U - thank you so much! keep up the amazing work
